com.epoch.constants
Interface StaticLimits

All Known Implementing Classes:
Assgt, CourseRW, DataConversion, DBLocalTables, DBTables, EnrollmentRW, FnalGroupDefRW, ForumRW, HWRead, HWWrite, QSetRead, QSetWrite, QuestionRead, QuestionRW, QuestionWrite, ReactorResultsRW, ResponseLogger, ResponseRead, ResponseWrite, RGroupCollectionRW, RxnCondnRW, SynthBadSMsRW, SynthMenuOnlyRgtsRW, TranslationRead, TranslationWrite, UnitConvertRW, UserRead, UserWrite
public interface StaticLimits

Stores maximum string lengths by database schema, a few other arbitrary limits.

Field Summary
static int MAX_EVAL_SUBEXPR
          Maximum number of characters in the expression describing how to combine subevaluators, limited by database varchar2 field.
static int MAX_FNAL_GRP_NAME
          Maximum length of a functional group's name, limited by database varchar2 field.
static int MAX_IMPOSSIBLE_SM_NAME
          Maximum length of an impossible starting material's name, limited by database varchar2 field.
static int MAX_ORACLE_IN
          Maximum number of values in an IN clause in an Oracle SQL statement.
static int MAX_R_GROUP_COLL_NAME
          Maximum length of an R group collection's name, limited by database varchar2 field.
static int MAX_RETRIEVE_RESPONSES
          Maximum number of responses (in rank order) pulled from the log.
static int MAX_RXNCOND_NAME
          Maximum length of a reaction condition's name, limited by database varchar2 field.
static int MAX_UNIT_NAME
          Maximum length of a measurement unit's name, limited by database varchar2 field.
 

Field Detail

MAX_ORACLE_IN

static final int MAX_ORACLE_IN
Maximum number of values in an IN clause in an Oracle SQL statement. Actual limit is 1000, but playing it safe.
